title: Contemporary Artists Series - Phaidon Press (Book Design)
content:
Hi people,

Anyone wants to give this a go?

I have been fascinated with this typeface the moment I saw it. It is used by Malanie Mues in the book design for the Contemporary Artists Series by Phaidon Press. ( [http://www.muesdesign.com/html/contemporary.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014132227/http:/www.muesdesign.com/html/contemporary.html "http://www.muesdesign.com/html/contemporary.html"))

Much thanks in advance :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014132227im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Francis_Alys_%20Phaidon_Press.jpg)
